title: The KZG Ceremony - or How I Learnt to Stop Worrying and Love Trusted Setups
description: Danksharding, ProtoDanksharding, & EIP4844 make use of KZG commitments which require a trusted setup. As usual, Ethereum does this differently by having an order of magnitude more participants than previous trusted setups. I will be running through why the trusted setup is needed, how it works, and why you should trust it.
